name: .NTRK File Extension
summary: Learn about .NTRK files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Pacific Fighters, a flight simulator game; contains an "online" flight mission recording; created using the "Quick Record" feature or by clicking the Start Recording button on the game menu during a mission.

content: NTRK files are stored in an encrypted format and are used to compete in online ladders. They can be played back in Pacific Fighter.
NOTE: NTRK files do not store video data. They store position and time information for all objects during a mission.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
